problem.markdown:
>>1.If the reflection co-effecient is zero an osmotic membrane is :<< (x) Fully permeable ( ) Impermeable ( ) Partially permeable ( ) None
>>2.Which of the following membrane is used for dehydration of alcohol:<< ( ) Cross linked PVA (x) Polycarbonate ( ) Cellulose acetate ( ) None
>>3.With increasing membrane thickness selectivity of membrane :<< ( ) Increases ( ) Decreases (x) Remains unchanged ( ) None
